texts.content_text3: UN Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC)
texts.content_text9: Criminalises sexual exploitation of children and promotes prevention and victim assistance.
texts.content_text7: Recognises children as rights-holders and establishes guiding principles such as best interests of the child, non-discrimination, participation, and development.
texts.content_text10: Establishes minimum standards on information, support, protection, and participation of victims in criminal proceedings, with special safeguards for children.
texts.content_text8: Protects fundamental human rights, including respect for private and family life, as interpreted by the European Court of Human Rights.
